name: Jump'n'Run
description:
A jump and game project I made as an Intern Developer in NMY Developer Team.
I was a developer intern, wrote various scripts and designed functions. As an artist, created all the game elements(Pixel and 3D), animated and implemented them.
Office Model: NMY
Senior Developers: Wolfram Kresse, Peter Eschler, Mark Peter
//A character walks on a path in a realistic space.
//Left-Right buttons for Move, Space button for Jump
//Flies to collect (they actually show the pathway).
//A dialogue panel gives info
//Player walks until the end of the path to get the next Door therefore to the next room.
//Activating a Door teleports Player to the next room's path.
//Force Fields and Blockers to skip boring areas fastly or gamify them. Blockers makes the space look like a game, like a contemporary art installation.
//There are invisible camera triggers for special places. Some follow the Player on a certain height, some just static.
// Which allows the user to see all the spaces with a stylish mini game with fun. //
Watch the video to see full experience!
